title: Stampede
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Jacques Bobet and Claude Fournier
brief_description: Stampede Week in Calgary, with special focus on the main performers of the show, the cowboys and the horses. You see the herds come thundering in, and get to know one cowboy very well as he waits for his ride, He moves from rodeo to rodeo, always trying for the jackpot on the back of a bucking bronco.
